BP_Action_LerpMoveActor

Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Core/Actions/BP_Action_LerpMoveActor

.. cpp:class:: BP_Action_LerpMoveActor : public BP_Action_C

Moves the specified actor from its current position to the specified EndLocation through a lerp
